name: Cyber City (itch) (drreww, charre)
description:
DESCRIPTION

Cyber City is single-player game where you control two characters, Phaze and Flux.  Each character has unique abilities that enable them to be able to help each other solve various puzzles. It takes place in the future where there are robots and cyborgs living alongside people. Robots and cyborgs are not seen as people and are treated differently. This leads to Phaze and Flux to lead a protest to get equal rights. The protest gets shut down, leaving Phaze and Flux with only one option: to go talk to the mayor himself. Phaze and Flux start making their way through the city, solving puzzles, and dodging obstacles that lie in their way.

     CONTROLS
  • WASD:

        - WASD to move, Space to jump, Shift to sprint, and E to use your ability and to interact.

  • Arrow Keys:

        - Arrow keys to move, C to jump, Z to sprint, and X to use your ability and to interact.

  • Both:

        - Tab to switch characters.

        - P to pause.

     SOFTWARE
  • Unity 
  • Plastic SCM
  • Visual Studio Code
  • Aseprite
  • Procreate
  • FL Studio
  • Audacity
     TEAM

Logan - Artist, Level Designer, Writer

Drew - Programmer, Composer, Sound Designer
